name: Wheelchair Clicker
description:
Wheelchair Clicker

Wheelchair clicker is a fun clicker game about getting wheelies in your smoking new wheelchair.

Controls

Click Wheely in the center of the screen to earn one wheely.

The counter on top of the screen shows how many wheelies you have.The counter on the bottom shows how many wheelies per second you earn from upgrades.

You may use wheelies to purchase upgrades by clicking on the upgrades on the side of the screen. When you hover over an upgrade, the price in wheelies and the current quantity of the upgrade are listed.
